Jesús de 49 años,  es una mujer muy inspirado en su trabajo que salió adelante en la venta de cloro y desinfectante para sacar adelante a su familia en los gastos del hogar.

Ella labora a diario en algunas ocasiones la ayuda su hijo, su esposo es obrero albañil y tienen hijos mayores de edad que ya trabajan y le ayudan en los gastos de la casa. Con el préstamo quiere comprar materiales como cloro y jabón para aumentar su productividad. En un futuro quiere formalizar mas su negocio darse a conocer por sus clientes.
texts.en:
Jesús, age 49, is a hard-working woman who has earned a living selling bleach and disinfectant so she could pay for her family's household expenses.

She works every day, sometimes with the help of her son.  Her husband is a bricklayer and they have three adult children who all work and help with home expenses.  The loan will be used to buy bleach and soap to increase productivity.  

In the future she would like give her business a more formal structure and attract more customers.

loans.use: To buy bleach and soap

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
Cristina es socia del  Banco Comunal “Flor de Canela”, ubicado en el distrito y departamento Puno, tiene 41 años de edad.  Está separada y tiene 2 hijos (uno ya es independiente).  Cuenta con estudios secundarios.
Ella se dedica al servicio de transporte urbano, trabaja como cobradora.
Es socia del Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace ocho meses, el primer monto solicitado fue de S/ 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en el mantenimiento de su carro.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de S/ 1000.00 nuevo soles, comprará cuatro unidades de llantas para su carro.  Nos cuenta que a veces viaja a Desaguadero para traer mercaderías  como abarrotes para luego distribuirlos a sus clientes. Esta actividad la realiza en paralelo para poder ayudarse con los gastos familiares.
Su sueño es crecer en el servicio de transporte y mejorar su calidad de vida.
Lo que le gusta  es la   responsabilidad y las charlas que brindan del Banco Comunal.
texts.en:
Cristina is a member of the 'Flor de Canela' community bank which is located in Puno district and department.  Cristina is 41 years old, separated, and has two children (one of whom lives independently).  She has a high school level of education.

Cristina works in urban transport services.  She works as a bus conductor.

Cristina has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for eight months.  The first loan she applied for was for 500 Peruvian soles.  She invested that money in having maintenance work done on her car.

Cristina will use this new loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles to buy four tires for her car.  She tells us that she sometimes travels to Desaguadero to bring back merchandise such as groceries which she then delivers to her customers.  She does this work in parallel with her job so that she can cover her family's expenses.

Cristina's dream is to grow in her transport service and improve her quality of life.

What Cristina likes about her community bank are the responsibility and the talks that they give.

loans.use: to buy four tires for her car

loans.name: Xiomara Teodora

texts.es:
Xiomara de 31 años, es una mujer muy inspiradora en su trabajo que por medio de una vecina que le indico que había una escuela del sector que necesitaba una persona para que abriera un bar en el lugar y por la misma razón que necesitaba trabajar la abrió.

Ella labora sola y su horario es de 8H00 am a 5H00 pm. Esta unida  su conyugue es maestro albañil y tiene tres hijos que no viven con ella. Con el préstamo va a comprar mercaderia para su negocio para aumentar más sus ingresos y construir mejor su casa comprando cemneto, bloques. En un futuro desea terminar su vivienda y poner un restaurant.
texts.en:
Xiomara is 31 years old and a very inspiring woman.  She learned, through a neighbor, that there was a school in her area that needed someone to open a snack bar and, as she needed to work, she opened one. 

Xiomara works on her own, from 8.00am to 5.00pm.  Her husband is a master builder and she has three children who do not live with her.  Xiomara will use this loan to buy merchandise for her business in order to further increase her income and better build her home, buying cement and blocks.  In the future, she would like to finish building her home and set up a restaurant.

loans.use: to buy cement and blocks to adapt her business

loans.name: Fanny Narcisa

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Nuevo Amanecer se reúne en el sitio Bajo de Montecristi en la provincia de Manabí, es un pequeño lugar rodeado de mucha vegetación, sus habitantes se dedican a diferentes actividades como comerciantes y empelados de fabricas.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Fanny, tiene 39 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 9 y 5  años de edad que estudian en la escuela. Su esposo es maestro en una escuela de la localidad.

Ella es maestra en una escuela en Montecristi pero también tiene una tienda de comestibles en su casa, allí además de vender productos de primera necesidad también vende productos de bazar.  Abre su tienda desde las 13h00 hasta las 21h00 ya que en las mañanas tiene que ir a la escuela a dictar clases y los fines de semana  atiende todo el día su local. Nos cuenta que lleva con su tienda  15 años y que empezó con el primer crédito.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, embutidos y otros productos de primera necesidad. Está en el Banco Comunal hace 15 años, es una de las fundadoras del banco y le gusta por los beneficios que ha recibido de la institución.

 Su meta es seguir creciendo en su negocio.
texts.en:
Every two weeks, the Nuevo Amanecer (New Dawn) community bank meets in Bajo de Montecristi, in Manabí province.  It is a small place which is surrounded by vegetation.  The locals are engaged in different business activities such as selling merchandise or working in factories.

Here we meet 39 year-old Fanny who is married and has two children aged 9 and 5 who are both in school.  Her husband is a teacher in a local elementary school.

Fanny is a teacher in an elementary school in Montecristi but she also has a grocery store in her home.  As well as selling household essentials, she also sells other miscellaneous products.  She opens her store from 1.00pm to 9.00pm since she has to go and give classes at school in the mornings.  On weekends, she opens her store all day.  She tells us that she has run her store for 15 years and she started it with her first loan.

Fanny will use this loan to further stock her store.  She will buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents, cold cuts and other essential household products.  She has been a member of her community bank for 15 years.  She is one of the bank's founding members.  She likes being a member because of the benefits that she has received from the institution.

Fanny's goal is to continue growing in her business.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, cold cuts,detergents and other essential household products

loans.name: Freddy Antonio

texts.es: Freddy  hombre trabajador, vive con su pareja de vida e hijos, familia humilde. Emprendedores en el campo de la panadería teniendo su micro empresa. Con muchos esfuerzos y deseo de superar han encontrado la manera de obtener el sustento diario. Iniciaron con fondos propios desde hace un tiempo. Sus proyecciones a corto plazo es continuar incrementando su producción y utilidades. El préstamo será requerido para la compra de materia prima siendo utilizado para mejorar el bienestar financiero del cliente. Comprar harina, levadura, azúcar, manteca, aceite, gas butano, entre otros materias para la elaboración de su producto.
texts.en:
Freddy is a hard-working man who lives with his life partner and children.  They are a humble family.  Freddy is an entrepreneur who has a small bakery business.  With a lot of effort and a desire to improve himself, he has found a way of earning a living.  Freddy started his business with his own funds some time ago.  His short-term plan is to continue increasing his production and profits.

Freddy needs this loan to buy raw materials.  He will buy flour, yeast, sugar, butter, oil, butane gas and other materials for making his products.

loans.use: to buy raw materials

loans.name: Noemi 1 & 2 Group

texts.en:
Catalina is the coordinator of the group Noemi 1 & 2. The group is based in Los Alcarrizos, a dusty industrial town north of Santo Domingo. Here she makes her home in a simple structure with her two children.  She is a single mom.

Catalina has come to Esperanza with the goal of growing her business but, also, because it is a way of development for the community. She operates a business where she sells second hand clothes; she buy a big box of clothes (with all kind, blouses, pants, shirts, skirt, tshirt, etc.). 

With this loan she intends to increase her inventory. She believes that this will allow her to supply more clients. She will use the profits to save and to address some needs in her family. In the long term she would like to continue growing her business with Esperanza to the point where she can sell more products, reach more clients, and to have enough profits to build her own home and to continuing providing to her children. She especially wants to pay for their studies. Thank you so much for your support!

loans.use: to buy second hand clothing to sell.

loans.name: Dany Justina

texts.es:
Dany es socia del  Banco Comunal “Flor de Canela”, ubicado en el distrito y departamento de Puno, tiene 43 años de edad.  Es madre soltera y tiene 4 hijos en edad escolar.  Tiene estudios de  secundaria incompleto.
Es socia del Movimiento  Manuela  Ramos hace 3 años,  su primer préstamo  fue  de        S/ 300.00 nuevo soles, préstamo que utilizó para incrementar la mercadería de su negocio, lo cual consiste en la venta de plantas medicinales  - productos naturistas.
Con éste préstamo de S/ 1000.00 nuevo soles, comprará hierbas como acompuri, chanca piedra, uña de gato, achote, mano yupa, etc. Sus hijos la ayudan en el negocio. 
 Su sueño es mejorar en su negocio  y abrir otro local de venta de productos naturista.
Lo que le gusta  del Banco Comunal son las reuniones, compartir ideas con las socias y lo que gana sus ahorros.
texts.en:
Dany is a member of the "Flor de Canela" community bank which is located in Puno district and department.  She is 43 years old, single, and has four school-age children.  She did not complete high school.

Dany has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for three years.  Her first loan was for 300 Peruvian soles and she used that money to increase her business merchandise.  She sells medicinal plants - natural products.

Dany will use this loan for 1,000 soles to buy plants such as acompuri, chanca piedra (stonebreaker), uña de gato (cat's claw), annatto, mano yupa, etc.  Her children help her in her business.

Dany's dream is to improve her business and open another sales location for selling her natural products.  What she likes about her community bank are the meetings, sharing ideas with her fellow group members and earning money on her savings.

loans.use: to buy plants such as acompuri, chanca piedra (stonebreaker), uña de gato (cat's claw), annatto, mano yupa, etc.

loans.name: Ana Cary

texts.es:
Ana tiene 22 años de edad, es soltera y reside junto a su hijo en una zona rural de Saltur que se ubica en la localidad de Zaña, un distrito agrícola y ganadero que se encuentra situado en la región Lambayeque, a más de cuarenta minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a venta de chicha de jora fresca  y cerveza los ofrece a sus vecinos y personas que vienen a trabajar en la zona, esta actividad la realiza hace tres años. El negocio es de mucha ayuda para su familia, ya que por medio de esta se encarga de ayudar al sostenimiento de su economía diaria.

Ana desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de insumos para elaborar la chicha de jora y también comprar cerveza  ya que la zona donde se ubica su negocio es turística y puede incrementar sus ganancias. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 800 nuevos soles con los cuales piensa lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Ana is 22 years old, single, and lives together with her son in a rural area of Saltur which is located in Zaña.  This is a district where people farm and raise livestock.  It is in Lambayeque region, more than forty minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

Ana sells fresh 'chicha de jora' (a corn-based drink) and beer to her neighbors and people who come to work in the area.  She has been in this business for three years.  Her business is a great help to her family since it allows her to help support them financially.

Ana would like to expand her business by purchasing supplies for making her chicha de jora.  She would also like to buy beer since the area where her business is located is a tourist area and she will be able to increase her profits.  For this reason, she has requested a loan for 800 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa which she plans to use to achieve her goal.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make her products

loans.name: Juan Jose Cruz

texts.es:
Don Juan Jose Cruz R. P., es casado, tiene 47 años de edad,  cursó el segundo año de educación primaria, tiene 6 hijos 1 de los cuales está estudiando, se dedica a la artesanía, a la elaboración de cortes típicos, lleva 20 años de experiencia en este trabajo, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa.

Decide solicitar un préstamos a ASDIR, que le servirá para ampliar su capital de trabajo como también su maquinaria de trabajo, va a comprar hilo mish de primera calidad, hilo lustrina y un telar, ya que su objetivo es contar con un negocio mas grande y productivo.
texts.en:
Don Juan Jose Cruz R. P. is married, 47 years old and completed two years of primary education.  He has 6 children, 1 of whom is currently in school.  Don Juan Jose makes his living in handicrafts; he makes traditional fabrics.  He has 20 years of experience doing this work and has the help of his wife.

He decided to request a loan from ASDIR, which will help him to increase his working capital as well as his machinery.  He is going to purchase high quality rayon thread, silk thread and a loom.  His goal is to create a bigger and more productive business.

loans.use: to purchase thread and a loom.

loans.name: Nelly Norma

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Nuevo Amanecer se reúne en el sitio Bajo de Montecristi en la provincia de Manabí, es un pequeño lugar rodeado de mucha vegetación, sus habitantes se dedican a diferentes actividades como comerciantes y empelados de fabricas.

La señora Nelly es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta porque se lleva muy bien con sus compañeras. Tiene 56 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene 6 hijos, 5 de los cuales ya son mayores de edad y el menor tiene 17 años y estudia en colegio, tres de sus hijos aun viven con ella además de una nieta de 12 años que también está en colegio y es como su hija. Su esposo es comerciante.

Ella realiza el crédito para ayudar a su esposo el cual tiene un negocio de fabricación y venta de ladrillos, el trabaja de lunes a sábado desde las 8h00 hasta las 17h00 junto a tres personas  a quienes les paga  un sueldo semanal, ellos se encargan de fabricar este producto para luego llevarlo en su carro a otras ciudades  a entregar en distintos lugares que requieren de los mismos.

Este crédito es para compara materia prima para la fabricación de los ladrillos como tierra negra, agua, cuerina y paja. Esta desde el inicio en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por el compañerismo que hay en el banco.
 
Su sueño es comprar otro carro ya que el que tienen les está dando muchos problemas.
texts.en:
The communal Bank "Nuevo Amanecer" (New Dawn) meets in a place called Bajo de Montecristi in the province of Manabí.  It is a small place surrounded by a lot of vegetation.  The residents make their livings in different activities, such as in business and as factory workers.

Señora Nelly is a founding member of the communal bank, and she likes it because she gets along well with the other members.  She is 56 years old, is married, and together with her husband has 6 children.  5 of her children are grown.  The youngest is 17 years old and studies in high school.  Three of her children still live with her in addition to one 12-year old granddaughter, who is also in school and who is like a daughter to Nelly.  Señora Nelly's husband is a business man.

She is requesting the loan to help her husband, who has a business making and selling bricks.  He works from Monday to Saturday from 8:00am until 5:00pm with three other people to whom he pays a weekly salary.  They see to the making of the product which they later bring in their car to other cities, where they deliver the bricks to different places that need them.

This loan is for the purchase of raw materials for making bricks: black dirt, water, imitation leather and straw.  

Señora Nelly has been with the communal bank since its inception, and she likes it for the friendships she finds with the bank members.
 
Her dream is to purchase another car, since the one they have is giving them a lot of trouble.

loans.use: to purchase black dirt, soil, imitation leather and straw for making bricks.

loans.name: Irma Galinda

texts.es:
Irma de 52 años, es una mujer inspiradora que salió adelante en su negocio vendiendo pelota y zapatos deportivos para una cancha que queda cerca de su casa.

Ella labora de 7H00 am a 8H00 pm. Su mayor dificultad es la delincuencia ya que varias veces le han robado ya que su sector se ha vuelto peligroso. Con el préstamo quieres comprar más mercadería para su papelería, cuadernos, plumas. En un futuro desea surtir mas su papelería y que su sus hijos estén más cerca de ella para que la ayuden.
texts.en:
Irma is 52 years old.  She is an inspiring woman who got ahead with her business selling balls and athletic shoes for a court near her house.

Irma works from 7:00am to 8:00pm.  Her biggest problem is crime, as her neighborhood has become dangerous; she has been robbed a number of times.  With the loan, she wants to purchase merchandise for her stationary store, like notebooks and pens.  In the future, she wants to further supply her stationary store and for her children to live closer to her so they can help her.

loans.use: to purchase school supplies, notebooks, pens and stationary.

loans.name: Delcy Roxana

texts.es:
Delcy  es socia del  Banco Comunal “Victor echave”, ubicado en el distrito de y departamento de Puno, tiene 23 años de edad, es  conviviente y tiene 2 hijos en edad escolar.  Tiene estudios de educación superior.
Desde hace tres años viene trabajando  con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su préstamo inicial fue de S/ 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio, ella se dedica a la venta de materiales y útiles escolares, también cuenta que confecciona banderas, escarapelas, adornos, cintillas, de acuerdo a las campañas del año.
La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo por la suma  de S/3000.00 nuevo soles, dinero que  invertirá para comprar seis cientos de cuadernos.  Ella trabaja sola en su negocio ya que su esposo trabaja como transportista (es chofer).
Su sueño es ser empresaria y tener una librería bien surtida que le permita mejorar sus ingresos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es el préstamo de la cuenta interna y la ganancia del ahorro.
texts.en:
Delcy is a member of the Victor Echave Communal Bank, which is located in the Puno district and province.  She is 23 years old, has a life partner, and has two school age children.  She has a post-secondary education.

She has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for three years.  She used her initial loan for 300 soles to invest in her business.  She sells school supplies and materials.  

She tells us that she also makes flags, rosettes, decorations, and ribbons according to the time of year.

She will request a new loan for 3,000 soles, which she will use to buy six hundred notebooks.  She works alone in her business because her husband works in transportation as a driver.

Her dream is to be a businesswoman and to have a well-stocked book store.  This will allow her to improve her earnings.  What she likes about the communal bank is the loan from the internal account and the earnings on the savings.

loans.use: to buy six hundred notebooks.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana es mujer trabajadora, de profesión docente con veintisiete años de experiencia, en donde ha logrado educar a sus dos hijos, así como las mejoras a su casa. El cual ha sido el objetivo todo estos años.
Hoy en día necesita reparar el techo, pero no cuenta con todo el capital, lo que recurre al financiamiento para lograr el cambio. Comprara láminas de zinc, perlines, golosos, para comenzar la obra.
Contenta ya que podrá hacer esta mejora ante del invierno,  así como pagar a plazos y cuotas a bajo interese.
texts.en:
Juana is a hard-working woman.  She is a teacher by profession and has 27 years experience.  She has managed to educate her two children and make improvements to her home which has been her goal all these years.

Juana currently needs to replace her roof but she doesn't have enough capital.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan.  She will buy metal sheets, beams and bolts so that she can start the work.

Juana is happy that she will be able to make this improvement before the winter comes.  She is also happy that she can pay by instalments at a low interest rate.

loans.use: to buy metal sheets, beams and bolts to replace her roof

loans.name: José Simón

texts.es:
José es un padre de familia de 43 años de edad que reside junto a su esposa y a sus tres hijos en el sector Jesús de Nazaret del distrito de José Leonardo Ortiz. Uno de los distritos más poblados de la región Lambayeque, caracterizado principalmente por tener altos índices de pobreza, ya que las personas viven generalmente en zonas urbanas marginales que carecen de servicios básicos.

José se dedica a brindar servicio de mecánica y ensamblaje de mototaxi y motocicletas, esta actividad la viene ejerciendo hace más de 5 años y gracias a ella solventa los gastos económicos de su familia. El negocio tiene buena acogida debido al buen servicio que brinda José. El desea comprar herramientas para su negocio y un motor para ensamblar una mototaxi que le permitirá alquilar e incrementar sus ingresos, de modo que su familia pueda vivir en mejores condiciones. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 500 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Jose is a 43 year-old father who lives with his wife and their 3 children in the Jesus de Nazaret neighborhood of José Leonardo Ortiz district. This is one of the most populated districts in the Lambayeque region, and it is characterized mainly by its high poverty rates, as people generally live in marginal urban neighborhoods that lack basic utilities.

Jose has a business where he works as a mechanic and assembles mototaxis (motorcycles with attached cabs used to transport people and goods) and motorcycles.  He has been doing this work for more than 5 years, and thanks to this business he is able to cover his family's household expenses.  Jose's business is well accepted in the area because of the good service that Jose provides.  He wants to buy tools for his business and a motor to assemble a mototaxi that he will rent out to increase his income so that his family can have better living conditions.  To do this, he is requesting a loan from the first time from Edpyme Alternativa for 500 Peruvian soles.

loans.use: to buy tools and a motor

loans.name: Doris

texts.es:
Doris es socia del  Banco Comunal “Las Retamas”, ubicado en el distrito y departamento D. Puno, tiene 65 años D. edad.  Está casada y tiene 8 hijos, todos independientes.  Doris tiene estudios D. educación primaria (incompleta). 
La señora  se dedica  a la venta D. golosinas como: galletas y gaseosas en forma ambulatoria.  Trabaja  con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace cuatro años.  Su préstamo inicial fue D. S/ 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que utilizó en su negocio venta D. golosinas.
Con éste nuevo préstamo D. S/ 1700.00 nuevo soles, comprará cinco cajas D. galletas, chocolates, golosinas, gaseosas, etc.,  Doris recibe la ayuda D. su hija.
Su sueño es mejorar su negocio para poder crecer y mejorar sus ingresos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal son las reuniones  y las charlas.
texts.en:
Doris is a member of the “Las Retamas” community bank which is located in Puno district and department.  She is 65 years old, married, and has 8 children who all live independently.  She did not finish elementary school.

Doris sells candies, cookies and soda as an itinerant street vendor.  She has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for four years.  Her first loan was for 300 Peruvian soles and she invested that money in her business selling candies.

She will use this new loan for 1,700 soles to buy five boxes of cookies, chocolates, candies, soda, etc.  She receives help from her daughter.

Doris' dream is to improve her business so that she can grow and improve her income.  What she likes about her community bank are the meetings and the talks.

loans.use: to buy five boxes of cookies, chocolates, candies, soda, etc.

loans.name: Narcisa Angela

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Nuevo Amanecer se reúne en el sitio Bajo de Montecristi en la provincia de Manabí, es un pequeño lugar rodeado de mucha vegetación, sus habitantes se dedican a diferentes actividades como comerciantes y empelados de fabricas.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Narcisa, tiene 38 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos, uno es mayor de edad y la menor de 15 años que estudia en colegio. Su esposo es chofer. Ella aprendió belleza en un Instituto de Manta.

Ella realiza trabajos de belleza y arreglos personales en su casa, realiza tinturados, cortes de cabello, pintado de uñas, entre otras cosas, también realiza trabajos a domicilio cuando sus clientes lo requieren. Nos cuenta que lleva 5 años que está trabajando de esta forma pero espera en un futuro instalar un salón de belleza completo y así ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes.

Este crédito lo va a emplear para comprar tintes, permanentes y productos de belleza de Avon y Yanbal.  Esta en el Banco Comunal hace tres años  y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan sus compañeras.
  
Su sueño es  tener salón de belleza más grande.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Nuevo Amanecer" holds its meetings in Bajo de Montecristi in Manabí province.  This is a small place surrounded by a lot of vegetation.  Its inhabitants are involved in a variety of economic activities including retail trade and working in factories.

In this place we meet Narcisa, who is 38 years old, married and has 2 children.  One of her children is an adult, and the other is a minor who is 15 years old and is in school.  Her husband works as a driver.  She went to beauty school in an institute in Manta.

Narcisa has a beauty salon in her house.  There she provides haircuts, hair coloring, nail painting and other services.  In addition, she works in at the residence of her customers when they request it.  She tells us that she has been doing this kind of work for 5 years, but in the future she hopes to set up a complete beauty salon so that she could offer better service to her customers.

She will use this loan to buy hair dye, permanent solution and beauty products from the Avon and Yanbal lines.  She has been with her communal bank for 3 years, and she enjoys the support that is provided by her fellow group members.

Her dream is to have a larger beauty salon.

loans.use: to buy hair dye, permanent solution and beauty products from the Avon and Yanbal lines

loans.name: Maria Albertina

texts.es:
Albertina de 47 años, es una mujer inspiradora en su trabajo ya que desde niña le gusto mucho la costura y un día se compró su primera máquina de coser ya hace 12 años atrás y desde ese entonces hace costuras a sus familiares y vecinos.

Ella labora a toda hora dependiendo de los pedidos se queda hasta tarde trabajando en su propia casa. Está casada y el es maestro carpintero y tiene su taller en su misma domicilio de la misma relación tienen dos hijos menores que todavía estudian. Con el préstamo va a comprar telas y una máquina de coser nueva para poder incrementar su negocio. En un futuro quiere poner un negocio de papelería.
texts.en:
Albertina is 47 years old. Her work is inspiring; she has loved to sew since she was a young girl and has been making clothing for her family and neighbors since she bought her first sewing machine 12 years ago.

She works at any hour of the day, depending on how many orders she has, and often works until late at night from home. Albertina is married. Her husband is an experienced carpenter and has a workshop set up in their house. They have two young children who are in school. 

With this loan, Albertina will buy fabric and a new sewing machine to increase her business capacity. In the future, she hopes to start a stationery store.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Cleopatra Domitila

texts.es:
Cleopatra de 65 años, es una mujer inspiradora en su trabaja que después de jubilarse abrió una pequeña tienda en su domicilio.

Ella labora diariamente en todo el día. En su negocio le dificulta la competencia  por que alrededor de ella hay mas tienda que más productos. Con el préstamo quiere comprar más productos como arroz azúcar. En un futuro ella desea tener otra tienda en otro lugar de la ciudad.
texts.en:
Cleopatra, 65, is an inspiring women because after retiring, she opened a small store in her home.


She works all day every day.  What is difficult for her is the competition because there are stores around her that have more products.  With the loan she would like to buy items such as rice and sugar.  In the future she would like to have another store in another part of the city.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar and supplies for her store

loans.name: Eliana Gueny

texts.es:
Eliana es socia del  Banco Comunal “Dulce Amanecer”, ubicado en el distrito y departamento de Puno, tiene 39 años de edad.  Es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos en edad escolar.  Eliana cuenta con estudios de educación superior. 
Viene  trabajando  con el  Movimiento Manuela Ramos más de cuatro  años.  Su primer préstamo de S/ 300.00 nuevo soles, lo invirtió en su negocio de venta de artículos artesanales.
Con éste préstamo de S/ 1300.00 nuevo soles, comprará materiales como: cinco conos de lanas, cinco kilos de  lana de alpaca y de bebe alpaca, todo esto  para la producción de chompas, chullos,  chalinas que  luego venderá a sus clientes. Sus hijos le ayuda en el negocio.
Su sueño es ser una gran empresaria y mejorar sus ingresos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal son las reuniones y las charlas.
texts.en:
Eliana is a member of the “Sweet Dawn” Communal Bank, located in the district and department of Puno. She is 39 years old and lives with her partner; together they have 3 children of school age. Eliana has a college education.

Eliana has worked with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for over four years. Her first loan of S/ 300.00 nuevo soles was used in her business to sell artisanal products.

With Eliana’s new loan of S/ 1300.00 nuevo soles, she will buy materials like: five wool cones, five kilos of alpaca wool as well as baby alpaca wool, all of it will be used to make sweaters, chullos (woolen hats with earflaps), chalinas (Peruvian scarves), that she will later sell to her customers. Her children help her in the business.

Eliana’s dream is to be a great entrepreneur and to improve her earnings.

What Eliana likes about her communal bank are the meetings and their talks.

loans.use: buy materials like: five wool cones, five kilos of alpaca wool as well as baby alpaca wool.

loans.name: Cruz María

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Nuevo Amanecer se reúne en el sitio Bajo de Montecristi en la provincia de Manabí, es un pequeño lugar rodeado de mucha vegetación, sus habitantes se dedican a diferentes actividades como comerciantes y empelados de fabricas.

En este lugar  conocimos a la señora Cruz, tiene 33 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos de 6, 4 años y un bebé de tres meses, el mayor  estudia en la escuela. El marido es obrero.
 
Tiene un pequeño local en el cual vende pañales, paños húmedos y otros productos para bebé, trabaja todos los días desde las 8h30 hasta las 17h00, nos cuenta que sus ventas son muy buenas ya que es el único local que vende estos productos en su localidad, lo cual le deja muy buenas ganancias. Lleva varios años con su negocio y está muy contenta porque cada dia su negocio crece más. Sus productos los compra en Manta ya que allá consigue a muy buen precio. Le gusta su negocio porque le permite superarce económicamente y estar al tanto de sus hijos.

Este crédito es para comprar pañales, paños húmedos y otros productos para bebé. Está en el Banco Comunal casi desde el inicio, es la secretaria del mismo y le gusta por la ayuda y los beneficios que recibe de la institución.
 
Su sueño es agrandar su negocio.
texts.en:
The “Nuevo Amanecer” (New Dawn) Communal Bank meets in Manabi province at Bajo de Montecristi, a small place surrounded by much vegetation. Its inhabitants are dedicated to different activities, including merchants and factory employees.

In this locale we got to know Cruz, who is 33 years old and maintains a common law relationship from which there are 3 children, ages 6 and 4, and a baby of 3 months. The eldest studies in school. The husband is a worker.

Cruz has a small stall where she sells diapers, baby wipes, and other products for babies. She works every day from  8:30 am until 5:00 pm. She tells us that sales are very good since hers is the only stall that sells these products in that locale, thus providing good earnings. Cruz has had her business for several years and she is very content because each day, the business grows. She buys her products in Manta, since prices are good there. Cruz enjoys her business; it permits her to get ahead economically and to provide her children's needs.

This loan is to buy diapers, baby wipes, and other products for babies. Cruz has been a member of her communal bank almost from the start. She is currently its Secretary and she likes it for the help and benefits she receives from this institution.

loans.use: to buy diapers, baby wipes, and other products for babies.

loans.name: Santa Celestina

texts.es:
Doña Santa Celestina S. C. D. O., es casada, tiene 48 años D. edad, tiene 5 hijos que no estan estudiando, se dedica a la artesanía, al tejido D. cortes típicos, lleva 25 años D. experiencia en este trabajo,  cuenta con el apoyo D. su esposo quien se dedica también a la artesanía, inició como operaria, y ahora quiere ampliar su capital D. trabajo.

AcuD. a ASDIR para solicitar un préstamo que invertirá para compra D. hilo, un telar y sus accesorios, ya que quiere que su negocio sea mas granD., y asi mejorar sus ingresos y su condición D. vida.
texts.en:
Doña Santa Celestina S. C. D. O. is married and is 48 years old; she has 5 children that are not in school. She is an artisan and weaves typical dresses, she has over 25 years of experience in her work and has the support of her husband who is also an artisan. She started as an operator and now wants to expand her working capital.

Mrs. Santa went to ASDIR for a loan that will be used to buy threads, and a loom as well as its accessories since she wants her business to be bigger so that she can improve her earnings and quality of life.

loans.use: buy threads and a loom.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es:
Ricardo tiene 34 años de edad, es casado y reside junto a su esposa y sus tres hijos en el distrito de Olmos, una zona agrícola de bastante movimiento comercial que se encuentra situada en la provincia de Lambayeque, a más de una hora y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Ricardo se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte en su mototaxi en la ruta Olmos y caseríos. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace 8 año, por ello conoce  a la perfección este rubro, sus principales clientes son los comerciantes que desean transportar su mercadería a sus puestos, vecinos que van sus caseríos y otros. Gracias a esta actividad solventa los gastos económicos de su familia.

Ricardo desea realizar una reparación a su vehículo de modo que le permita dar un buen servicio y generar mayores ingresos  para que su familia pueda vivir en mejores condiciones, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1300 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Ricardo is 34 years old, married and lives with his wife and three children in the district of Olmos, an agricultural area that has a lot of business since it is located in the province of Lambayeque, about and hour and a half from the city of Chiclayo.

Ricardo provides transportation in his mototaxi in the route Olmos and its hamlets. He has been doing this work for 8 years and because of it he knows his work to perfection, his main customers are salespeople that wish to transport their merchandize to their stalls, neighbors going to their hamlets and others. Thanks to his work he is able to meet his family’s expenses.

Ricardo wants to repair his vehicle so that he can provide good service and have greater income for his family and that they will be able to have better living conditions, which is why he decided to go to Edpyme Alternativa for the first time to get a loan of 1300 nuevos soles.

loans.use: repair his vehicle.

loans.name: Maria Nelly

texts.es:
Maria Nelly de 41 años, es una mujer inspiradora en su trabajo que por medio de una amiga ingreso en la venta de cosméticos y ropa por catálogos.

Ella labora de lunes a domingos y hace pedidos a quienes promociona sus productos. Con el préstamo ella desea comprar más productos como perfumes ropa y cosméticos para aumentar sus ingresos. En un futuro ella quiere tener un negocio de papelería y que sus hijos se gradúen.
texts.en:
Maria Nelly is 41 years old, she is an inspiring woman in her work, and began selling makeup and clothing by catalogue through a friend.
Maria Nelly Monday through Sunday and takes orders from people she offers her items to. With the loan she wants to buy more products like perfumes, clothing, and makeup to increase her earnings. In the future, she wants to have a stationary store and that her children graduate.

loans.use: buy clothing, perfumes, and makeup.

loans.name: Estela Angelica

texts.es:
Estela es socia del  Banco Comunal “Flor de Canela”, ubicado en el distrito y departamento de Puno, tiene 49 años de edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijos.    Estela tiene estudios superiores pero no concluido.
Ella se dedica al servicio de transporte suburbano o interurbano (transporte).  También cuenta que brinda servicios de juegos de videos y play station.  Trabaja con e Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 6 años.  Su préstamo inicial fue de S/ 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que utilizó en su negocio.
Con éste préstamo de S/ 2500.00 nuevo soles, comprará algunos play station, para que su  negocio tenga más clientes.  En el negocio de transporte, trabaja junto  con su esposo.
Su sueño es tener un negocio de internet con el cual pueda complementar su otro negocio y mejorar sus ingresos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del préstamo, los bajos intereses y la solidaridad entre las socias.
texts.en:
Estela is a member of the “Cinnamon Flower” Communal Bank, located in the district and department of Puno. She is 49 years old, married and has 4 children. Estela has some college education but she didn’t graduate.

Estela works in transportation local or long-distance. She also provides video games and play station games for her customers. Estela has worked with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for some 6 years. Her initial loan was of S/ 300.00 nuevo soles and was used for her business.

With the new loan of S/ 2500.00 nuevo soles, Estela will buy some play stations, so that her business has more customers. She works with her husband in her transportation business.

Estela’s dream is to have an internet café business that would complement her other business and to improve her earnings.

What Estela enjoys about her Communal Bank is the ease of acquiring the loan, the low interest rates and the solidarity between the members.

loans.use: buy some play stations.

loans.name: Arnoldo Antonio

texts.es:
Arnoldo es un pequeño comerciante, con su propia pulpería en donde ha sido su medio de sustento, para su familia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa e hijos.
El inicio con capital propio con pocos productos, en donde vino a fortalecer con financiamiento que Afodenic dio mediante el crédito. El cual está contento ya que su inventario aumento, a comprar más productos de variedad.
Hoy con este nuevo préstamo comprara: productos lácteos, productos enlatados, gaseosas, granos básicos, el cual es consumido más por sus clientes
texts.en:
Arnoldo is a small business owner, he has his own convenience store that has been his primary source of income for his family and has the support of his wife and children in running the business.

Arnoldo started his business with his own capital and a small quantity of products. He was able to have more merchandize through a loan from Afodenic. He is happy since he was able to increase his inventory and buy a greater variety of products.

Today with this new loan Arnoldo will buy: dairy products, canned goods, sodas, and basic grains which are consumed in greater quantities by his customers.

loans.use: buy basic grains, sodas, dairy products and canned goods to have better sales.

loans.name: Nuestro Progreso 1 & 2 Group

texts.en:
Bartola lives in L. Alcarrizos, a dusty industrial town north of Santo Domingo. Bartola and her group of 10 members are taking loans for their businesses. This group is named Nuevo Progreso 1 & 2 (New Progress).

Bartola requires a loan to buy blankets, bedding sets and tablecloths. She runs a little store in her house where she sells clothes and decoration items like curtains, bedding sets, etc. 

This is Bartola´s first loan with Esperanza International. She will take a step toward improving her business by investing this loan to increase her sales. She has had her business for over 5 months.  Years ago she was doing business but she stopped to take care of her family; now her 5 children are grown and she can work again to help improve their lives. Her most difficult challenges are to work for the wellness of her family and to improve their kind of living.

She says that her favorite thing is to attend to the church.  Bartola and her group are thankful for your support!

loans.use: to buy blankets, bedding sets and tablecloths to increase her sales.

loans.name: Con Fe Y Alegria Group

texts.es:
Elmer se dedica a la venta de tubérculos tiene un puesto de venta en el mercado de su zona ya tiene con el negocio cerca de 6 años, anteriormente  trabajó ayudando a su padre en su negocio de estructura metálica, pero debido al poco trabajo decidió dejarlo y ayudar a su mama que se dedica a la venta de verduras  poco a poco aprendió sobre el negocio, junto a su hermano deciden separarse para abrir por su propia cuenta un negocio de venta de verduras y tubérculos, así probaron durante 15 días lamentablemente su hermano se desanimo y lo dejo solo, Elmer   empezó con muy poco capital pero durante todo este tiempo ha surgido y actualmente tiene 2 camionetas con las que brinda servicio de transporte a sus colegas que traen  sus productos desde el mercado mayorista, esto lo a animado a dedicarse  a este rubro quiere comprarse otro camioncito y también anhela comprarse su propio terreno su préstamo  le servirá para seguir invirtiendo con la compra de los productos que vende como papas, cebollas, tomates etc. actualmente el ocupa el cargo de presidente del grupo “FE Y ALEGRIA” 

* Elmer esta con polo a rayas.
texts.en:
Elmer sells tubers and has a stall in his city market; he has had his business for about 6 years. Previously, Elmer worked helping his father framing metals but due to the little work he decided to leave the business and help his mother who sells vegetables. Little by little he learned about the business and with his brother they decided to open their own stalls to sell vegetables and tubers. They tried out the business for 15 days and sadly his brother got discouraged and left. Elmer started out with very little capital but at this time he has gotten ahead and at present has 2 trucks that he uses to give transportation to his colleagues who bring their products from the wholesaler market. This has encouraged him devote himself to this work and wants to buy another truck and hopes to buy his own plot of land in the future. The loan will help him to keep buying his products that he sells for example: potatoes, onions, tomatoes, etc. At present he is the president of the group “Faith and Happiness.”

*Elmer’s the one with the striped polo.

loans.use: buy tubers and vegetables.

loans.name: Eulogia

texts.es:
Eulogia es socia del  Banco Comunal “Flor de Canela”, ubicado en el distrito y departamento de Puno, tiene 45 años de edad.  Es soltera y tiene un hijo.  Cuenta con estudios de educación superior. 
Viene trabajando  con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace siete años, su préstamo inicial fue de S/ 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio, ella se dedica a la  venta de materiales de escritorio y servicio de fotocopias.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de S/ 500.00 nuevo soles, comprará hojas al por mayor y tóner para la fotocopiadora.
Su sueño es tener una librería grande y bien implementada.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal son las reuniones y el compartir ideas entre las socias
texts.en:
Eulogia is a member of the “Cinnamon Flower” Communal Bank, located in the district and department of Puno. She is 45 years old, is single and has a son. She has a college education.

Eulogia has worked with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for about seven years. Her first loan was of S/ 300.00 nuevo soles, it was used for her business. She sells office supplies and provides a photocopier service.

With the new loan of S/ 500.00 nuevo soles she will buy paper wholesale and toner for the photocopier.

Eulogia’s dream is to have a big bookshop that is very well stocked.

What Eulogia enjoys about her Communal Bank are the meetings and sharing ideas between the members.

loans.use: buy paper wholesale and toner for her photocopier.

loans.name: Kuña Kyrey Group

texts.es:
El comité “Kuña Kyrey” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Santaní. Todas las integrantes del comité desarrollan actividades diferentes y formaron un grupo muy unido y capaz de realizar conjuntamente actividades que fortalecen su compañerismo. Este comité está en 1er. ciclo con muchas ganas de sobresalir.
La sra. Nancy Mercedes es la presidenta del grupo, ella se dedica a la cria y venta de animales, en especial de aves de corral, desde hace tiempo que este negocio fue montado y con mucho sacrificio lo fue acrecentando, hoy día cuenta con buena clientela, generalmente almacenes y para cualquier persona que quiera cocinar en su casa o restaurantes.
Ella se esmera por sobresalir al igual que sus amigas del comité, todas tratan de superarse cada día mejorando la calidad de sus productos, por eso solicitan el crédito de Kiva, para comprar balanceados y medicamentos de modo que puedan mejorar los animales que ofrecen para el consumo.
texts.en:
The committee “Kuña Kyrey” started with the union of some neighbors from the city of Santaní. All of the members of the committee have different jobs and started a very united group that is capable of doing activities together that strengthen their team spirit. This committee is in their 1st loan cycle and is very encouraged to get ahead.

Mrs. Nancy Mercedes is the president of the group, she breeds and sells animals, especially chickens, for a long time since she set up the business and with a lot of sacrifice it started to grow and now she has a good customer base and generally has enough in stock for any person that wants to cook in their home or for restaurants.

Mrs. Nancy works hard to get ahead as well as her friends from the committee who all try to succeed by improving the quality of their products which is why they are seeking a loan from Kiva, to buy food and medicines to improve the animals that they sell for consumption.

loans.use: buy food and medicine for their animals.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es:
Felicitas  es socia del  Banco Comunal “Victor echave”, ubicado en el distrito y departamento de Puno, tiene 43 años de edad, está casada y tiene un hijo (independiente).  Felicitas cuenta con estudios secundarios.
La señora  trabaja  con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace un año, su primer préstamo inicial fue de S/ 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de venta de libros, útiles escolares y materiales de oficina.
Con este crédito de  S/ 2000.00 nuevo soles, comprará juguetes educativos, títeres, un ciento de mandiles,  un ciento de cuaderno especial de dibujo doble y triple ralla.  En el negocio le ayuda su esposo quien se desempeña como chofer de taxi.
Su sueño es tener una librería bien implementada que le permita mejorar sus ingresos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal son los ahorros, el préstamo de la cuenta interna y la puntualidad de los pagos
texts.en:
Felicitas is a member of the Victor Echave Communal Bank which is located in the District and Department of Puno. She is 43 years old, married, and has a son who is independent. Felicitas has a high school education.

Sra. Felicitas has been working with Manuela Ramos for one year. Her first loan of 500 PEN was invested in her business of selling books, school supplies, and office supplies.

With this loan of 2000 PEN, she will buy educational toys, puppets, one hundred aprons, and one hundred special notebooks with double-ruled and triple-ruled paper. In her business, she has the help of her husband who also works as a taxi driver.

Her dream is to have a well-established bookstore that will enable her to improve her income. What she enjoys most about the Communal Bank are the savings, the ability to borrow against the internal account, and the promptness of the payments.

loans.use: to purchase educational toys, puppets, aprons, and notebooks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase thread and a loom.

loans.name: Magda Ligia

texts.es: La señora Magda Ligia Chávez, tiene la edad de 47 años , habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe , es una pequeña comerciante que lucha día a día para poder salir hacia adelante con su familia ; su esposo le apoya con los gastos del hogar , ellos tiene un hijo de seis años actualmente estudiante de primaria , los planes hacia un futuro es poder darle un mejor bienestar a su pequeño hijo y poder comprar un tramo en el mercado y poner una tienda ya que es su mayor sueño .Doña Magda desde hace más de  ocho años se dedica a la venta de ropa y comestico la mayor dificultad que se le presenta es no poder  contar con mercadería suficiente y poder abastecer a sus cliente . El crédito lo quiere para la compra de ropa y cosmético ya que de esa manera su inventario crece y sus ventas serán mayores y a la vez su ingreso para poder pagar en tiempo y forma.
texts.en:
Sra. Magda Ligia Chávez is 47 years old and resides in the town of Ticuantepe. She is a small businesswoman who struggles each day so that her family can get ahead. Her husband helps with the household expenses. They have a six-year-old son who is currently an elementary school student. Her plans for the future are to provide the best for her young son’s welfare, purchase a stand at the market, and fulfill her greatest dream of opening a store.

Doña Magda has been selling clothing and cosmetics for eight years. Her greatest difficulty is not having enough merchandise whenever her customers place their orders. This loan will be used to buy clothing and cosmetics so that she can increase her inventory and generate more sales. With the income she earns, Magda will be able to repay her loan on time and according to terms.

loans.use: to purchase clothing and cosmetics.

loans.name: Fidela

texts.es:
Fidela  es socia del  Banco Comunal “Flor de Canela”, ubicado en el distrito y departamento Puno, tiene 55 años de edad, está casada y tiene 3 hijos. Estudió solo hasta 3ro de educación secundaria, tiene a su cargo a uno de  sus nietos.
Ella tiene un puesto en el mercado central  donde realiza venta de comidas y nos cuenta también que tiene una tienda de abarrotes. Viene trabajando con Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace cinco años.  Su préstamo inicial fue de S/ 200.00 nuevo soles, dinero que utilizó para comprar productos e insumos para su negocio de venta de comidas.
Con éste préstamo de S/ 2000.00 nuevo soles, comprará arroz, verduras, papa, etc. para abastecer su restaurant y  mercaderías para la tienda de abarrotes.  Ella cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo quien trabaja en el magisterio.
Su sueño es tener una panadería que le permita mejorar sus ingresos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del préstamo y el bajo interés.
texts.en:
Fidela is a member of the Communal Bank “Flor de Canela” (Cinnamon Flower) which is located in the District and Department of Puno. She is 55 years old, married, and has three children. Fidela studied through the third year of high school and is responsible from one of her grandchildren.

She has a space at the central market where she sells food and also has a grocery store. Fidela has been working with Manuela Ramos for five years. Her first loan was in the amount of 200 PEN and used to buy products and supplies for her food business.

With this loan of 2000 PEN, she will buy rice, vegetables, potatoes, and other supplies to restock her restaurant. She will also acquire merchandise for her grocery store. Fidela has the support of her husband who works for an institution that trains teachers.

Her dream is to open a bakery so that she can improve her income. What she enjoys most about the Communal Bank are the convenience of the loans and the low interest rates.

loans.use: to purchase rice, vegetables, potatoes, and other supplies for her restaurant and merchandise for her store.

loans.name: La Amistad Group

texts.es:
Ada pertenece al grupo comunal "La Amistad".
Ada està casada con Javier y tienen 3 hijos; su hija mayor ya esta casada y vive fuera de casa, los otros 2 hijos de 23 y 17 años respectivamente viven con ella.
Ada tiene su tienda de abarrotes (vende artìculos de primera necesidad), trabaja todo el dìa, desde la 6 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche. Ada es una mujer muy entusiasta y trabajadora; y decidiò poner este negocio en su propia casa por apoyar al menor de sus hijos quien sufre de limitaciones motoras por ser un joven especial; a pesar de ello actualmente èl cursa estudios tècnicos.
El prèstamo otorgado lo invertirà en comprar mercaderìa nueva que le ayude a surtir mejor su tienda.
(En la fotografìa, Ada està de pie y primera de la derecha en la segunda fila, esta vestida con chompa color marron y polo color rosa)
La socia de la foto pequeña es Martha Gladys S. R., no pudo asistir a la reuniòn por encontrarse trabajando.
texts.en:
Ada is a member of the Communal Bank “La Amistad” (The Friendship). She is married to Javier and has three children. Her oldest daughter is already married and lives outside of the home. The two other children, ages 23 and 17 respectively, still live with her.

Ada has a grocery stO. where she sells basic necessities. She works every day from 6am to 10pm. Ada is an enthusiastic and hardworking woman who decided to start this business in her home so that she could take care of her youngest child who has special needs since he suffers from motor limitations. Despite these challenges, he was able to finish his technical studies.

The loan being provided will be invested in the purchase of new merchandise so that she can better stock her stO.. In the photograph, Ada is standing on the right in the second row. She is wearing a brown sweater and a pink shirt. A small photograph of Martha Gladys S. R. appears in the corner since she was not able to attend the meeting because of work.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Sinforosa

texts.es:
Sinforosa T. O., es soltera, tiene 28 años de edad, curso el tercer años de estudio de primaria, se dedica al comercio, cuenta con un tienda donde vende artículo de consumo diario, lleva 7 años con este negocio, inicio en su local con un molino de mixtamal pero ahora cuenta con una tienda.

Decide solicitar un préstamo para invertir en su negocio para comprar mas mercadería: cajas de jugos, cajas de huevos, pastas, gaseosa, golosinas, etc. Quiere ver su negocio mas grande y mas rentable.
texts.en:
Sinforosa T. O. is 28 years old, single, and has a third grade education. She is a merchant and has a store where she sells everyday consumer products. Sinforosa has been in this business for seven years. Her business started out as a grain mill that process hominy, but now it has been converted into a store.

She is requesting a loan to invest in more merchandise for her business such as juice boxes, cartons of eggs, pasta, sodas, candy, and other items. Sinforosa wants to see her business expand and become more profitable.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Darlene

texts.en:
Darlene L. makes an all-purpose luggage case for students and professionals needing durable, practical, yet attractive bags. What differentiates Darlene’s bag from others is its design. Divided into compartments that are stacked like shelves, it is ideal for storing books, electronics, clothes and more. Set on wheels, the bag is easy to transport.

The idea of creating an ultra-efficient luggage case came to Darlene when her daughter, a sophomore in college, complained of not having an efficient bag for carrying her belongings around campus. Soon after, Darlene came up with the bag’s initial design as she was driving back from a conference in Mississippi. Now, nearly a year later, Darlene has a provisional patent and a prototype (see picture) that she is in the process of refining.

Darlene has hired a product design firm to help her finalize the bag’s layout and composition materials. A manufacturing company will make the bag, which she hopes will begin final production within the next three to six months. This loan helps Darlene finish refining the bag’s design and allows her to manufacture samples that can be physically tested. The loan also provides her with the capital to manufacture a very small initial batch of the final product.

Darlene is originally from New Orleans’ Lower 9th Ward. She works nights as a bridge operator, which she likes because it frees her to work with her manufacturer and design consultant during business hours. Previously, she worked at a community health clinic for the city of New Orleans, but the clinic closed after Hurricane Katrina. She is a published author, having written <u>Spend Your Last Dollar: God’s Plan of Salvation</u>, a book that draws lessons from the Bible and applies them to everyday life. Darlene is married with three grown children.

loans.use: to pay for designing and manufacturing luggage cases.

loans.name: Ileana Maria

texts.es: La señora Ileana Maria Martínez , tiene la edad de 45 años , habita en el municipio de Ticuantepe junto a su esposo que le apoya con los gastos del hogar y sus hijas , los planes hacia un futuro es poder brindarle siempre apoyo a sus hijas para que puedan seguir estudiando y lleguen a ser profesionales  ya que ella por su situación económica no culmino sus estudios , doña Ileana se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza y ropa lo cual le genera ingresos mensuales y con sus ganancias y el apoyo de su esposo casi logran el sueño de poder tener una pequeña tienda en su casa de habitación , ella se siente muy contenta con financiamiento ya que los intereses son bajos y eso le ayuda para poder crecer como comerciante .El crédito lo quiere para la compra de cosmético y ropa .
texts.en:
Sra. Illeana Maria Martínez is 45 years old. She resides in the town of Ticuantepe with her husband, who helps with the household expenses, and their daughters. Her future plans include providing her daughters what they need to continue their studies and help them become professionals since she was not able to finish her education as a result of her financial situation.

Doña Ileana sells beauty products and clothing in order to generate a monthly income. With her earnings, she and her husband are close to fulfilling their dream of opening a small store in their home. Ileana is very pleased with the loan because of the low interest rates and the fact that it has helped her grow as a merchant. This loan will be used to buy cosmetics and clothing.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics and clothing.

loans.name: Lola Amada

texts.es:
Lola de 46 años, es una mujer trabajadora que empezó como comerciante para subsistir y mantener a sus hijos vendiendo ropa y bisuterías.

Ella labora sola de lunes a sábados de 10H00 am a 17H00pm en la venta de ropa llevándoles a sus clientes. En algunas ocasiones le teme la delincuencia cuando lleva mercadería o dinero de las cobranzas. Con el préstamo quiere comprar materiales de construcción como arena, cemento, bloques y varias mercaderías para la venta de sus cosmeticos. En un futuro desea poner un local comercial en su domicilio.
texts.en:
Lola, age 46, is a hardworking woman who started working as a merchant so that she could support her children. She sells clothing and trinkets.

Lola works alone Monday through Saturdays from 10am to 5pm, delivering clothes to her customers. Occasionally she is fearful of crime whenever she has to carry merchandise or cash payments that she has received. With this loan, Lola will buy materials such as sand, cement, blocks, and various cosmetics to sell. In the future, she wants to establish a store in her home.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics and construction materials.

loans.name: Walter Pastor

texts.es:
Walter tiene 24 años de edad, es soltero y  reside junto familia en el caserío Pomape, una zona rural que tiene como actividad principal a la agricultura y que se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de La Victoria, a veinte minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Walter  tiene un taller de carpintería en su domicilio donde ofrece todo tipo de trabajos de carpintería con diseños innovadores de acuerdo al gusto del cliente, esta actividad la realiza hace 5 años, por ello conoce a la perfección este rubro y debido a su buen trabajo lo recomiendan sus clientes han hecho que su negocio se haga conocido y que cuente con una clientela fija.

Walter desea adquirir madera en cantidad para poder brindar trabajarla y elaborar los pedidos que le solicitan. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1400 nuevos soles que le ayuden a conseguir su objetivo.
texts.en:
Walter is 24 years old, single, and lives with his family in the village of Pomape, a rural area where the main business activity is agriculture. This community is in the District of La Victoria and located 20 minutes away from the city of Chiclayo.

Walter has a carpentry workshop in his home where he produces all types of woodwork with innovative designs based on the preferences of the customer. He has been in this business for five years and is known for being a perfectionist in his trade. As a result of his good work, Walter has received recommendations from his customers that have helped him develop a good reputation and establish a steady clientele.

He wants to acquire wood in large quantities so that he can continue to work and fulfill the orders that have been submitted. For this reason, Walter is requesting a loan of 1400 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa to help him achieve this goal.

loans.use: to purchase wood in bulk.

loans.name: Vilma Violeta

texts.es:
Vilma de 52 años es una mujer inspiradora en sacar adelante a su familia que decidió abrir su tienda de vivieres.

Ella labora sola en todo el día,  está casada su conyugue es comerciante independiente tiene 2 hijos que están en escuela. Con el préstamo desea comprar mercadería como arroz, azúcar, aceite para aumentar la productividad de su negocio.
texts.en:
Vilma is 52 years old. This inspiring woman wanted her family to get ahead, so she decided to open a grocery store.

She works every day by herself. Vilma is married and her husband works as an independent merchant. They have two children who are in school. She wants to use her loan to buy merchandise such as rice, sugar, and oil so that she increase productivity in her business.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, and oil.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca  es socia del  Banco Comunal “Flor de Canela”, ubicado en el distrito y departamento de Puno, tiene 31 años de edad, está separada y tiene 3 hijos.  Francisca cuenta con grado de instrucción secundaria.
La señora es una socia nueva que recientemente se incorpora al Movimiento Manuela Ramos, ella se dedica a la venta de alimentos. Con éste préstamo de S/ 500.00 nuevo soles, comprará un saco de papa, chuño, camote, pollo, chancho.  Paralelamente se dedica al cuidado de niños (Wawa Wasi), junto con su amiga Nancy.
Su sueño es seguir teniendo su Wawa Wasi y mejorar poco a poco.
Lo que le gusta  del Banco Comunal son los ahorros y la ganancia.
texts.en:
Francisca is a member of the Communal Bank “Flor de Canela” (Cinnamon Flower) which is located in the District and Department of Puno. She is 31 years old, separated from her spouse, and has three children. Francisca has a high school education.

She is a new member who recently joined Manuela Ramos and earns her living by selling food. With this loan of 500 PEN, she will buy a sack of potatoes, dried potatoes, yams, chicken, and pork. In addition, she operates a day care center with her friend Nancy.

Her dream is to continue with her day care business and make gradual improvements. What she enjoys most about the Communal Bank are the savings and the interest that is earned.

loans.use: to purchase a sack of potatoes, dried potatoes, yams, chicken, and pork.

loans.name: La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El comité “La Esperanza” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Chore - Santaní. Todas las integrantes del comité desarrollan actividades independientes, como son las ventas, fábrica de carbón, cría de animales, etc. Las integrantes formaron un grupo muy unido y capaz de realizar conjuntamente actividades que fortalecen su compañerismo. Este comité está pasando en el 2do. ciclo con muchas ganas de salir adelante con este grupo.
La sra. Marina se dedica a la cria y venta de cerdos, es un negocio que adoptó desde hace mucho tiempo, pues a pesar de que al principio le costó mucho trabajo, con el tiempo fue ganando clientes y buena reputación en el negocio, lo cual le ayudó a superarse dentro de la competencia.
Ella solicita el préstamo para poder comprar balanceados y medicamentos para cerdos, pues quiere ganar mayor cantidad de clientes y necesita mantener el nivel de calidad de sus productos.
texts.en:
The committee “La Esperanza” (The Hope) was formed as a result of several neighbors from the city of Chore-Santaní joining together. All of the committee members engage in independent businesses involving sales, producing charcoal, raising animals, and other trades. They have developed a close group that is capable of working together in activities that strengthen their friendship. The committee is in its second loan cycle and eager to move forward as a group.

Sra. Marina raises and sells pigs. She has been in this business for a long time. Even though she had to work extremely hard in the beginning, Marina was able to gain customers over time and develop a good reputation in her business. This has helped her overcome the competition. She is requesting a loan to buy balanced feed and medicines for her pigs. Marina wants to attract more customers, so she needs to maintain the level of quality in her products.

loans.use: to purchase balanced feed and medicines.

loans.name: Lucy  Fanny

texts.es:
Lucy es una madre de familia de 30 años de edad, es casada y reside junto a su familia en el caserío Paredones que se ubica a 10 minutos del distrito de Mórrope. Un distrito agrícola que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Lambayeque, a más de una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo

Se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales menores y aves de corral, el cría patos, pavos y gallinas en la parte posterior de su domicilio y cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo las ofrece en venta a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde reside, conoce a la perfección este rubro por eso cuenta con clientela fidelizada, también visita la Cuidad de Chiclayo quincenalmente para ofrecerlos en los mercados. Adicionalmente ella tiene una pequeña bodega en su domicilio.

Lucy desea adquirir alimento balanceado para sus aves y animales para incrementar su negocio, así también desea comprar abarrotes para su bodega. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Lucy is a 30 year old mother.  She is married and lives with her family in the Paradones settlement, 10 minutes from the Mórrope district.  This is an agricultural district located in the Lambayeque province, more than an hour from Chiclayo.

She raises and sells small animals and coral birds such as ducks, turkeys, and chickens behind her house.  When they reach a good stage in development, she sells them to merchants who visit the zone.  She is an expert in this field, so she has faithful customers.  She also goes to Chiclayo every two weeks to sell in the marketplace, and has a small store that she runs out of her home.

She would like to buy balanced feed for her birds and animals.  This will allow her to grow her business.  She also wants to buy groceries for her store, so she has seen fit to request a loan for 1,000 PEN through Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to buy feed for her animals

loans.name: Blancanieve

texts.es:
La  Sra. Blancanieve C. B. es de la ciudad de San Estanislao, del Barrio Monte Alto, tiene 24 años de edad, es soltera, vive con su madre, la sra. Valeriana B. de 65 años de edad.
Actualmente tiene 2 hijos, todos mayores de edad que trabajan independientemente.
Posee una despensa en su domicilio particular, con clientela bien formada, buen ingreso, buenas referencias comerciales y personales, es una señora muy trabajadora y excelente cliente de nuestra institución y de otras entidades financieras.
La cliente solicita este crédito para comprar mercaderías (azucar, arroz, harina, yerba, fideos, etc.) para la venta en su almacén, ofreciendo las mejores calidades y obteniendo mejor ingreso.
texts.en:
Blancanieve C. B. is from the Monte Alto neighborhood of San Estanislao.  She is 24 years old, single, and lives with her 65 year old mother, Mrs. Valeriana B..  [Valeriana] has two adult children and both work on their own.

[Blancaniev] runs a pantry store from her home has established clients, good income, and good personal and business references.  She is a hard working woman and an excellent client of ours and of other financial institutions.

She is asking for this loan to buy merchandise (sugar, rice, flour, herbs, noodles, etc.) to sell in her store.  By offering the best quality, she can increase her income.

loans.use: to buy inventory for her store

loans.name: Lucilo Nicolas

texts.es: El señor Lucilo Nicolás C., tiene la edad de 49 años, habita en el barrio los Martínez, ubicado en el municipio de la concepción , junto a su esposa la cual es comerciante de frutas y verduras para poder apoyarlo con los gastos del hogar ya q ellos tiene cinco hijos , los dos mayores le apoyan con los trabajos del campo , los planes hacia un futuro es poder establecer diversos cultivos para poder obtener ingresos todo el año , ya que tiene 23 años de dedicarse al cultivo de  piña y es casi 18 meses para poder ver parte de lo invertido , agradece a Afodenic atrávez de fondo Kiva el financiamiento que se le otorga para poder darle mantenimiento  a sus cultivo para que estos no carezcan de fertilizantes e insumos y cuando salga la producción tenga una buena maduración y color para vender a un mejor precio y poder pagar en tiempo y forma su crédito .
texts.en:
Sr. Lucilo Nicolás C. is 49 years old and resides in the neighborhood of Los Martínez in the town of La Concepción. He lives with his wife who works as a fruit and vegetable merchant in order to help with the household expenses. They have five children. The two older children help with the farm work. His future plans include producing different crops in order to generate more income throughout the year. Lucilo has been cultivating pineapple for 23 years. It will be almost 18 months before he will be able to see part of his investment.

Lucilo is grateful to AFODENIC for providing him with a Kiva loan so that he can maintain his crops. He lacks the fertilizers and supplies needed for his crops to reach the proper maturity and color. As a result, he will be able to sell his crops at a good price and repay his loan on time and according to terms.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and farming supplies.

loans.name: Elisa Marina

texts.es:
Elisa es una madre de familia de 27 años de edad, es soltera y reside junto a su familia en la Urbanización El Pescador del Distrito San José de la ciudad de Chiclayo, una zona  caracterizada por la pesca que se encuentra ubicada al norte del Perú.

Ella cuenta con una pequeña bodega instalada en su domicilio. Allí ofrece en venta a los vecinos y clientes de la zona diversos productos de consumo diario, entre productos de primera necesidad, abarrotes, golosinas, galletas y bebidas gaseosas. El negocio cuenta con muy buena acogida. Con esta actividad ella ayuda a su esposo con el sostenimiento económico de su familia.

La creciente demanda que la bodega de Elisa ha venido experimentando ha hecho que ella piense en ampliarla adquiriendo más productos. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.

Elisa es una mujer bastante trabajadora y de muy buen carácter, las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y cariño.
texts.en:
Elisa is a 27-year-old mother, single, who resides with her family in the urban area El Pescador of the San José district in the city of Chiclayo, an area characterized by the fishing industry located in the northern part of Peru. 

She has a small general store located in her home. There she sells a variety of consumer staples to the neighbors and customers in the area, including basic staples, groceries, sweets, cookies and soft drinks. The business is doing very well. With this business she is helping her husband provide economic support to the family. 

The growing demand experienced by Elisa's shop has led her to think of expanding it through the purchasing of more products. Thus she has thought it advisable to seek a loan of 2,000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa. 

Elisa is quite a hard-working woman and of very good character. Those who know her have great respect and affection for her.

loans.use: to purchase products for her shop.

loans.name: Angelita Petita

texts.es:
Angélica de 68 años, es una mujer  inspirada en su familia que decidió abrir su negocio en la venta de productos de belleza, poco a poco fue incrementando su capital de trabajo. 

Actualmente trabaja en la mañana y tarde  haciendo llamada telefónica para los pedidos de sus clientes. Vende productos de uso personal variado como perfumes, cremas, desodorantes. Está casada el trabaja como maestro constructor. Tiene tres hijos. Con el préstamo quiere adecuar su vivienda y comprar más productos de bellezas para aumentar su ganancias y tener una vida saludable.
texts.en:
Angélica is 68 years old.  Inspired by her family, she decided to open her business selling beauty products, and gradually increased her working capital.

She currently works mornings and afternoons, making phone calls for her customers’ orders.  She sells various personal products, such as perfumes, creams, deodorants.  She is married, and he works as a construction foreman.  She has three children.  She wishes to use the loan to improve her home and to buy more beauty products, to increase her earnings and have a healthy life.

loans.use: to buy cement, blocks, beauty products.

loans.name: Antonieta Maricela

texts.es:
Doña Antonieta Maricela Z. T., es casada, tiene 24 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, se dedica a la artesanía al tejido de fajas típicas, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo en este negocio, lleva 8 años de experiencia en este trabajo, inició siendo operaria.

Acude a las oficinas de ASDIR para solicitar un préstamo que le servirá para inversion en una compra de terreno que va a efectuar, compra que haran junto con su esposo. Dese seguir trabajando para mejorar su condicion de vida.
texts.en:
Mrs. Antonieta Maricela Z. T. is married and is 24 years old. She did not have the opportunity to study and she works sewing typical Guatemalan belts. Her husband supports her in this business. She has 8 years of experience and started as an operator. 

She came to the ASDIR offices requesting a loan to help her and her husband invest in the purchase of land. She wants to continue working to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: purchase a plot of land.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es: La señora Rosa Maria López C. , tiene la edad de 54 años , habita en el municipio de la concepción , en el barrio San Caralampio , ella es madre  soltera , tuvo  cinco hijos de los cuales todo independientes , la mayor afectación que se le presenta es la alza de los precios en los productos agrícolas , desde hace 23 años se dedica al cultivo de cítricos , los planes hacia un futuro es poder establecer una manzana mas de limones para que sus hijos trabajen con ella y puedan hacer de ello un trabajo en familia y crecer como comerciante . El crédito lo quiere para la compra de fertilizantes e insumos. Agradece  la confianza que le brinda Afodenic atrávez de los fondos Kiva a pesar que ella es madre soltera y lucha día a día para poder ser madre y padre a la vez .
texts.en:
Sra. Rosa Maria López C. is 54 years old and resides in the neighborhood of San Caralampio in the town of La Concepción. She is a single mother of five children, all of whom are independent. The greatest challenge that she faces is the rising cost of agricultural products. Rosa has been cultivating citrus fruits for 23 years. Her future plans include growing 1.73 acres worth of lemons so that her children can work with her. This will create jobs for her family and help them grow as merchants.

This loan will be used to buy fertilizers and supplies. Rosa is grateful for the trust AFODENIC has demonstrated by providing her with Kiva funds. Despite being a single mother, she continues to play the roles of both parents each and every day.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and farming supplies.

loans.name: Las Damas De San Blas Group

texts.es:
Las mujeres del presente comité son de Ramal – Piribebuy que dista a 12 km aproximadamente de la oficina de Caacupe.
