Las integrantes del comité "Las Damas de San Blas", son personas muy trabajadoras, ellas están muy agradecidas con la Fundación Paraguaya porque gracias a las facilidades de las políticas de créditos ellas pudieron acceder a Kiva para solicitar ahora un préstamo de los inversionistas y de ese modo invertir en sus negocios y otras integrantes iniciar una actividad comercial.
La presidenta, la Sra. Catalina E. vive con su marido e hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de perfumes.
Ella junto con sus compañeras realizan constantes actividades para de ese modo poder adelantar el incremento de sus fondos comunes.
Catalina es una mujer valiente que trata de progresar con éxitos en cada emprendimiento y meta que se traza, por eso se anima a pedir créditos que la ayuden a alcanzar sus objetivos, pues sabe que sin ese aporte económico tropezaría en el camino que se decida seguir para lograr superar la pobreza.
texts.en:
The women in this group are from Ramal - Piribebuy, which is approximately 12 kms. from the office in Caacupe.

The members of the group "Las Damas de San Blas" are hard-working people.  They are very grateful to the Paraguaya Foundation for the good credit terms that have given them access to a Kiva loan to invest in their businesses, and in other cases begin business.

The president, Mrs. Catalina E., lives with her husband and children.  She sells perfumes.

She, as well as her team members, are constantly active in an effort to increase their common funds.

Catalina is a brave woman who strives to be successful at everything she does and for every goal she sets.  She uses the loans to help her meet her goals because she knows that without this support she would not be able to pull herself up out of poverty.

loans.use: To buy perfumes and colognes

loans.name: Francisco Wilberto

texts.es: El señor Francisco L. Hernández, tiene la edad de 47 años, habita en el municipio de Ticuantepe , junto a su esposa la cual labora como afanadora para apoyarle con los gastos del hogar , ellos tienen 3 hijos , todos estudian  el mayor   le apoya con las actividades del hogar y luego va a clases , los planes futuros es poder levantar un muro en su casa de habitación ya que el agua de la calle afecta por el mal olor y cuando esta es demasiado entra al terreno ,  don Francisco desde hace tres años labor como guarda de seguridad , la mayor afectación es que su salario no le ajusta para poder comprar de una sola vez materiales de construcción  . El crédito lo quiere para comprar zinc , cemento , arena , piedrín etc. .
texts.en:
Sr. Francisco L. Hernández, age 47, resides in the town of Ticuantepe with his wife who works as a housekeeper in order to help with the household expenses. They have three children. All of them are in school and help with the household activities before they leave for class. Francisco’s future plans include putting up a retaining wall for his house because the runoff water from the street has a bad odor and the smell comes into his house when it seeps into his property.

Don Francisco has been working as a security guard for three years. His major challenge is that he does not earn enough from his salary to make this one-time purchase of construction materials. This loan will be used to buy zinc, cement, sand, gravel, and other supplies.

loans.use: to purchase zinc, cement, sand, gravel, and other supplies.

loans.name: Blanca Yolanda

texts.es:
Blanca de 21, es una joven emprendedora que inicio en su negocio de venta de Cd para ayudar económicamente a sus padres.

Ella trabaja con esfuerzo y dedicacion diariamente vendiendo películas en Cd. Con el préstamo desea compras mas Cd de películas para mejorar sus ingresos y así comprar una maquina copiadora para aumentar sus ganancias y darle lo mejor a sus padres y en los estudios.
texts.en:
Blanca, age 21, is a young entrepreneur who began selling DVD's to help her parents economically.

She works hard and dedicates every day to selling her movie DVD's.  She plans to use the loan to buy more DVD's so she can improve her income and buy a copying machine.  This will help increase her earnings for education expenses and to give her parents a better lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy DVD's to increase sales

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
El comité se conformó, gracias al deseo de superacion de las mismas, al enterarse del programa Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras, decidieron reunirse en grupo y conformar el comité.
Las mismas dedican su tiempo a las ventas, ya sea de frutas, verduras, carne, panes, harina, huevo, azucar, ropas, etc. Además de la venta la mayoria de las señoras tambien trabajan en una carpinteria que se encuentra cercana a su comunidad, realizan trabajo de pinturas sobre madera, entallado, lija y corte.
Las mismas están muy agradecidas con la Fundacion Paraguaya por la oportunidad que les brinda. Ya que a través de la misma podrán mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
La sra. Yeny se dedica principalmente a la venta de carnes, ella posee un puesto donde ofrece todo tipo de carne para los distintos consumidores que deseen adquirir carne para la alimentación diaria. No es fácil progresar dentro de la pobreza pero ella confía en que los inversionistas las ayudarán a salir adelante con un apoyo financiero, que sirva para emprender mejores metas e incrementar sus negocios.
Ella solicita el crédito para poder comprar carnes en cantidades grandes de modo que luego obtenga menos costos y mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
This group was set up by women who wanted to improve their lifestyle and, upon hearing about the Women Entrepreneurs Program, decided to get together and form a committee.

The members are involved in sales of either fruit, vegetables, meet, bread, flour, eggs, sugar, clothing, etc.  Apart from sales, most of them also work in the carpentry business close to their community, doing jobs such as wood painting, carving, sanding and cutting.

They are very grateful to the Paraguaya Foundation for this opportunity.  It will allow them to improve their lifestyles as well as that of their families.

Mrs. Yeny has a stand where she sells all kinds of meat to customers who buy their food daily.  It is not easy to get ahead in cases of poverty, but she is confident that the lenders will help them with financial support so they can set better goals and increase their businesses.

She plans to use the loan to buy larger quantities of meat to lower her cost and increase earnings.

loans.use: To buy pork, beef, chicken, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Angela

texts.es:
Rosa R. 24 años, es una mujer trabajadora  que inicio si actividad por medio de una amiga vendiendo ropa por catálogos ella vio que era rentable que un día con el apoyo de su esposo compraron mercadería para venderlas.

Ella labora sola de 9H00am a 17H00pm le dificultad la delincuencia ya que por el sector donde ella vive es peligroso. Su esposo trabaja  como chofer en la empresa Logiran. Con el préstamo quiere comprar más mercadería como zapatos, pantalón, blusas para aumentar sus ingresos. En un futuro quiere adquirir una casa propia y establecer mejor su negocio en un local comercial.
texts.en:
Rosa R. is 24 years old. She is a hard-working woman who started her business because of a friend who sold clothing by catalog. She saw that the business was profitable so one day, with her husband's support, she bought some merchandise to sell.

Rosa R. works alone from 9am to 5pm. Her biggest challenge is crime because the area where she lives is dangerous. Her husband works as a driver for the Logiran company. With this loan she would like to buy more merchandise such as shoes, pants and shirts to increase her income. In the future she would like to buy her own house and to establish her business in a better, retail location.

loans.use: to purchase pants, shoes and shirts.

loans.name: Ran

texts.en: Mrs. Ran is married to Mr. Ton. She was born in 1953. They have two children:  one is a laborer and the other is employed in a garment factory. They are farmers who own a 1.5 hectare plot of land to grow rice for their own family and to sell. It is time to plow the rice field, but they do not have oxen. So, to improve this condition, Mrs. Ran is applying for a loan to buy two oxen for plowing.

loans.use: to buy two oxen for plowing.

loans.name: Pov's Group

texts.en:
Four members comprise this group loan. Each member’s portion of the loan will be used for different purposes in order to improve their family’s standard of living. Born in 1970, Mrs. Pov, the group leader selected by the members, is a pig and chicken breeder whose profit helps to support her family. Since her business is going well, she wants to expand and so is applying for a loan to buy more piglets and pig food.

Pov's husband is a teacher and farmer who owns a half-hectare plot of land upon which he grows rice to feed his family and to sell. This couple has four children who are studying in local public school.

loans.use: to buy more piglets and pig food.
